metadata.title: CVE-2015-7508 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the bmp_decode_rle function in libnsbmp.c inLibnsbmp 0.1.2 allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial ofservice (application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via the lastrow of RLE data in a crafted BMP file.

criterions.comment: libnsgif: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
